title: First Look: The Rodeo Labs Flaanimal 6 Titanium Gravel Bike
content:
Rodeo Labs updated the Flaanimal Ti bringing UDH compatibility, more refined 3D printed frame parts, improved tire clearance and a lighter overall construction

Read the full article at First Look: The Rodeo Labs Flaanimal 6 Titanium Gravel Bike on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
